title: seethaaraama seetharama
sahitya:
sItArAma sItArAma sItArAma mAm pAtum Ehi bhavanishAta bANa bAdhitam



anupallavi



 udara pOSaNEna lasita hrdayam anudinam pada sarOruhadvayEna parama karuNayA



caraNam 1



 candanapanka surucirAnga sundara dayAnidhE kunda tulasi brndamAla vanditAmara



caraNam 2



 savtruvamsha jaladhi pUrNa candra rAghava bhava vinAsha dEva sArvubhauma rAghava



caraNam 3



 sOmakOTi shObha shailavAsa shubhakara smagAna gIyamAna jagadIshvara



caraNam 4



 shyAmaLAnga bhadrashaila svAmi rAghava rAmadAsa mrdula hrdayavAsa rAghava
